body.p: It is highly recommended that you use some sort of mechanism to indicate that the task review process is finished in your workflow. Otherwise, the Content Author may end up merging changes more than once and this could result in some complicated conflicts.

You might have your own preferred method of letting the Content Author know that you are finished, but also includes a few options to help you.
From the Task Details page, you can click the Looks Good button to send a predefined "Looks Good" message to the Content Author. The most common use for this button is that it simply offers a very quick way to let the Content Author know that all the files have been reviewed and they look good without needing any changes.
You can click the Add Message button to create your own message to let the Content Author know that the review process in finished.
